name: 3 Lives to Live
description: Made for the Heart Jam 2018, the theme was Scarcity.  The idea for this game is that your lives are scarce, which is admittedly a very common thing in old-school games.  The original scope was much more complicated, but this was a learning experience to be sure.  Now that the jam is over, I can take my time and improve on things, so be on the lookout for "3 Lives to Live HD"!
